string-array.name: tts_demo_strings
string-array.item: This is an example of speech synthesis in English.
Voici un échantillon de synthèse vocale en français.
Dies ist ein Beispiel für Sprachsynthese in Deutsch.
Questo è un esempio di sintesi vocale in italiano.
Este es un ejemplo de síntesis de voz en español.

string-array.item: Most widely used file system type for mobile storage devices
Improved file system type, supports single files via 4G, when connecting to a PC you might need to install a driver first
